name: Jo Bill
description: I am widowed,Educated,very happy and a very liberal person.I love hanging out with my family very much.I surround myself with good people,good food and good laughs.I am honest,sincere,loyal,trustworthy and faithful to my family and friends. Love and laughter is what I am after,I am happy, strong, intelligent, affectionate, loyal, independent, somewhat adventurous, and love to laugh. I am looking forward to meet a great lady that will appreciate my qualities and will blend with hers. I appreciate a woman of good character and integrity. I would love to meet someone who could just crack me up!! That is very sexy….
